blog.name: crookedsunlight
blog.title: We Are Fighting an Army of Robots
blog.description:
…and I have a pencil and paper.
I think I’m getting an idea. Maybe it’s a sneeze. No, it’s an idea! This is a blog for my art, where I draw stuff...and things.

tags: trying to dig myself out of all the terrible shit that's been happening the past two months
summary:
I want to bend reality to my will. First time I've felt like drawing anything in weeks, so that's 
something. Just so happened...
caption:
I want to bend reality to my will.

First time I’ve felt like drawing anything in weeks, so that’s something. Just so happened to be the wizard with dangerous aspirations and extremely relatable mental health issues, so that’s…fine. It’s fine. (But it was not fine.)

reblog.comment:
I want to bend reality to my will.

First time I’ve felt like drawing anything in weeks, so that’s something. Just so happened to be the wizard with dangerous aspirations and extremely relatable mental health issues, so that’s…fine. It’s fine. (But it was not fine.)

trail.content:

blog.name: nilim
blog.title: The sky may be falling, but the stars look good on you
blog.description:
D&D, Critical Role, Discworld. 
-
I create meta, gifsets, fanart and fanfiction.

My inbox is always open for prompts, and I love getting them... but no guarantees.

summary: Caduceus and Lady Margalotta sipping tea and being cosy in jumpers.      Also cad just in the watch house helping out Cheery...
question: Caduceus and Lady Margalotta sipping tea and being cosy in jumpers.      Also cad just in the watch house helping out Cheery with dead bodies and making everyone cheese sandwiches and coffee       Keg and Nobby sharing cigarettes and coward status. (Molly helping Nobby with cross dressing)      CALEB AND THE LIBRARIAN.  "So youre an ape ja"  "Ooook"  "Ja, awesome. Got any smut?"  "Ook"   (All of this is the best thing)
answer:
It really fucking is the best. I’m so happy people see what I see. Just this massive potential for amazing shenanigans. 

These universes and characters deserve each other.

Also, Keg? She’s 100% a Discworld character already, no need to change anything. I think I posted about it a couple of months ago, but her aesthetic is a mix between the weathered, 5 o’clock shadow and cigar-smoking look of Sam Vimes and the redhead buzz cut look and the sub-surface anger of Tonker from Monstrous Regiment.

Proof:


(Paul Kidby art)

+

(This fanart is by the ever amazing @tealin, my intention is only to use it for demonstrative purposes!)

=

(Art by Ari)

summary: Fjord is a slippery motherfuck and he is just so hard to capture, ive slowly moved away from referencing the official design/art...
body:
Fjord is a slippery motherfuck and he is just so hard to capture, ive slowly moved away from referencing the official design/art and I’ve been happier with him.

Also threw in a cute lil Nott in a big sweater, I like to think she stole it from Caleb ☺️

tags: look at me projecting all over Caleb again
summary: Liam’s not said this, and Caleb the character might not even realize he’s feeling this way (if he is) but I think it’s not...
body:
Liam’s not said this, and Caleb the character might not even realize he’s feeling this way (if he is) but I think it’s not unlikely that another reason Caleb is pulling back after thinking he got “too close” to the others emotionally (besides it “distracting from his goals”) is that the last people he loved and cared for deeply died. Not only that, they died because of him, and because of his emotional connection to them.

Unless something directly contradicts this, I’m going to assume that subconsciously Caleb fears that anyone he cares about is in danger - from him, because that’s what him caring brings to other people. It fits with why he’s now so protective of Nott - he couldn’t stop himself from caring about her, but now that he does he’s desperate for her to somehow survive the curse of his affection.

reblog.comment:

Unless something directly contradicts this, I’m going to assume that subconsciously Caleb fears that anyone he cares about is in danger - from him, because that’s what him caring brings to other people. It fits with why he’s now so protective of Nott - he couldn’t stop himself from caring about her, but now that he does he’s desperate for her to somehow survive the curse of his affection.

Not only that, they died because of him, and because of his emotional connection to them.

Unless something directly contradicts this, I’m going to assume that subconsciously Caleb fears that anyone he cares about is in danger - from him, because that’s what him caring brings to other people. It fits with why he’s now so protective of Nott - he couldn’t stop himself from caring about her, but now that he does he’s desperate for her to somehow survive the curse of his affection.
trail.content:
Liam’s not said this, and Caleb the character might not even realize he’s feeling this way (if he is) but I think it’s not unlikely that another reason Caleb is pulling back after thinking he got “too close” to the others emotionally (besides it “distracting from his goals”) is that the last people he loved and cared for deeply died. Not only that, they died because of him, and because of his emotional connection to them.

Unless something directly contradicts this, I’m going to assume that subconsciously Caleb fears that anyone he cares about is in danger - from him, because that’s what him caring brings to other people. It fits with why he’s now so protective of Nott - he couldn’t stop himself from caring about her, but now that he does he’s desperate for her to somehow survive the curse of his affection.
